properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NM FROM BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_CD = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARD_DT FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARD_DT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') BOARD_DT, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_NM FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(BOARD_CD) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N'
